notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was supported by the Traditional Culture Convergence Research Program through the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF), funded by the Ministry of Science, ICT and Future Planning (2018M3C1B5052282), and the Korea Evaluation Institute of Industrial Technology (KEIT) through the Carbon Cluster Construction Project (10083586, Development of petroleum-based graphite fibers with ultra-high thermal conductivity) funded by the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy (MOTIE, Korea).
